short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace Twitter.com warning about content from blocked accounts with a more meaningful message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes, content from blocked accounts will show up in your Twitter.com timeline, with a warning and a "View" button to display the content.

This extension replaces the warning with a more ominous message, to encourage you not to click the "View" button.
